name: JavaScript
subTitle: Web Development Language
description: JavaScript is my foundational tool for building interactive and dynamic web applications. Its versatility allows me to create client-side and server-side functionality, enabling seamless user experiences and real-time interactions across platforms.

name: TypeScript
subTitle: Typed Javascript
description: TypeScript is my go-to tool for writing maintainable and robust code. Its static typing helps catch errors early in development, improving code quality and enabling better collaboration across teams. I rely on its advanced type system to build scalable applications with confidence.

name: React
subTitle: JavaScript UI library
description: React is my preferred library for creating dynamic and interactive user interfaces. Its component-based architecture allows me to break down complex UIs into manageable pieces, while its virtual DOM ensures fast rendering and a seamless user experience.

name: Next JS
subTitle: React Framework
description: Next.js is my framework of choice for developing modern, server-rendered React applications. It provides powerful features like static site generation, server-side rendering, and API routes, allowing me to deliver highly optimized and performant web applications.

name: NodeJS
subTitle: JavaScript runtime
description: Node.js is my trusted runtime for building efficient server-side applications. Its non-blocking, event-driven architecture allows me to handle multiple requests simultaneously, making it ideal for creating scalable back-end services and APIs.

name: MongoDB
subTitle: NoSQL Database
description: MongoDB is my go-to database for managing and storing data in a scalable and flexible way. Its document-oriented structure allows me to handle complex data models effortlessly, making it ideal for modern applications requiring fast and efficient data retrieval.

name: Tailwind CSS
subTitle: Utility-first CSS framework
description: Tailwind CSS is my go-to utility-first framework for designing responsive and modern web layouts. Its rich set of predefined classes enables rapid prototyping and customization without writing custom CSS, ensuring consistent design across the application.

name: Supabase
subTitle: Backend as a Service
description: Supabase is my preferred backend platform for creating scalable, real-time applications. With built-in authentication, database management, and APIs, it streamlines the development process and lets me focus on building features.

name: HTML
subTitle: Markup Language for the Web
description: HTML is the backbone of my web development workflow. It provides the structure and semantics for all web pages, enabling me to craft accessible and well-organized content for users.

name: CSS
subTitle: Styling for the Web
description: CSS is my tool of choice for styling web applications. It enables me to create visually appealing, responsive designs, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience across all devices.
